Raw Style

We all know what's hot in web design by checking the best showcases like Siteinspire and Cargo Collective.

Ungainly takes design one step further by listening closely the real world:

  1. The world is not perfect so your web site should not hide behind perfectionism.
  2. Instead of shiny, trendy, usual design you probably need something unique, raw, ungainly.

Yes! Give me that ungainly website

Split (A/B) testing

* * *

You and me might have ideas what works best for your customers.
But let them make the final decision!

Split testing presents two or more versions of the same website in a transparent way for visitors, for a short period of time.
Meantime in the background it measures which version is more effective to reach certain goals, like purchase and subscribe.
Then the best performing version will become the final website.

You can ask if it worths the extra efforts of having two or more different designs.
If your business depends on conversion rates yes, it worths!.

With split testing you can get a 30-40% performance boost or even more.

Responsive Web Design

* * *

Mobile and tablet took over the desktop and laptop.
In response we create websites automagically adapting to all different devices without using cheap tricks like http://mobile.mywebsite.com.

One website, many devices. Better user experience and lower costs.

I want a responsive web design!

Cloud Hosting

With cloud hosting you won't ever bother about servers, downtime and scalability issues when you hit high traffic.

Ungainly is using the cloud for all it's websites either running on Wordpress or Ruby on Rails.

Html 5

HTML5 makes Google, Yahoo and other internet search engines to better understand your website.
It is the first step towards the Semantic Web.

All sites created by Ungainly use HTML5. You can check if your current site supports HTML by using the Outliner.

Scrol Themes For Shopify

* * *

Shopify did not accepted these themes in their Theme Store. They were probably too ungainly.

If you like them you can purchase each for $ 1,000.
If you aim for exclusivity you must buy them all.

Iwoot!
